messages.title: Your Local Choice
messages.content: Only candidate that will speak up for local issues in Parliament. Listens to you and will work for you all year round with a local constituency office. Fights for vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 100% committed to serving you. Will never take on a second job and will open a local office and hold regular surgeries.
Against the cuts and will support NHS and fight for it.
Stop cuts to local schools. Will fight for your children's future.
Will bring good jobs to Corby and East Northamptonshire.
A deal that works for everyone.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The other parties can’t win in this constituency. It is a two horse race.

issues.education: Stop cuts to local schools and fight for children's future.
issues.health: Funding for the NHS. Support NHS and fight for it.
issues.labourEmployment: Bring good jobs to Corby and East Northamptonshire.

community.content: Created a crisis for NHS and mental health by underfunding GP appointments. Made huge cuts to adult social care. Cut budgets for police and fire services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Grew up here and educated here. 5 years experience in Westminster.

endorsements.endorser: Andy Sawford, former MP for Corby and East Northamptonshire
endorsements.endorsement: Beth has my full support. She is local, hardworking and really cares.
I’ve seen the damage Tories have done to our schools. We need Beth sticking up for our schools.
Beth has pledged to always fight for our health service.

examples: Only candidate that will speak up for local issues in Parliament.
Beth has my full support. She is local, hardworking and really cares.

Listens to you and will work for you all year round with a local constituency office.
Stop cuts to local schools and fight for children's future.
Bring good jobs to Corby and East Northamptonshire.
100% committed to serving you. Will never take on a second job and will open a local office and hold regular surgeries.
A Brexit deal that works for everyone.
